subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Chien-Ming Wang allowed five runs in four-plus innings, but the Yankees went ahead with five runs in their half of the fifth, and Melky Cabrera broke a tie with a homer in the eighth inning.
snippet: Chien-Ming Wang allowed five runs in four-plus innings, but the Yankees went ahead with five runs in their half of the fifth, and Melky Cabrera broke a tie with a homer in the eighth inning.
